mapper.select: SELECT A.GUILD_CODE, A.GUILD_NAME, A.SERVER, B.SERVER_NAME AS serverNm FROM GUILD A LEFT JOIN SERVER B ON A.SERVER = B.SERVER_CODE
SELECT import_time FROM SPEC WHERE GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code} ORDER BY import_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT A.nickname, A.level, A.spec, A.job, A.floor, A.time FROM SPEC A WHERE A.GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code} AND NICKNAME NOT IN (SELECT NICKNAME FROM ATTEND) ORDER BY floor desc, time asc, level desc
SELECT A.nickname, A.level, A.spec, A.job, A.floor, A.time FROM SPEC A INNER JOIN ATTEND B ON A.NICKNAME = B.NICKNAME WHERE A.GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code} ORDER BY floor desc, time asc, level desc

SELECT A.nickname, A.level, A.spec, A.job, A.floor, A.time, A.guild_code FROM SPEC A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.job not in
'${item}'
AND A.GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code} AND A.NICKNAME NOT IN (SELECT NICKNAME FROM SURO WHERE GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code}) ORDER BY floor desc, time asc, level desc

SELECT A.nickname, A.level, A.spec, A.job, A.floor, A.time, A.guild_code FROM SPEC A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.job in
'${item}'
AND A.job in ('없다')
AND A.GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code} AND A.NICKNAME NOT IN (SELECT NICKNAME FROM SURO WHERE GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code}) ORDER BY floor desc, time asc, level desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPEC ( nickname, level, spec, job, floor, time, import_time, guild_code )VALUES( #{nickname}, #{level}, #{spec}, #{job}, #{floor}, #{time}, now(), #{guild_code} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.NICKNAME, A.GUILD_CODE, A.SURO, B.JOB FROM SURO A LEFT JOIN SPEC B ON A.NICKNAME = B.NICKNAME WHERE A.GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code} AND A.SURO = #{suro}
SELECT JOB FROM JOB WHERE JOB NOT IN (SELECT JOB FROM SUP WHERE GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code})
SELECT JOB, GUILD_CODE FROM SUP WHERE GUILD_CODE = #{guild_code}
